title: Wandering Sha (Juvenile)
lore: Shell resonates to canopy pulses; follows biolume threads along creek beds.

title: Pearl Scribe
lore: Exudes chalky lacquer that hardens into micro-runes. Pearl-Weavers consult these during night audits.

title: Hushed Mote
lore: Glow intensifies near contested boundaries. Scouts release motes at dusk to test safe lanes.

title: Bark Harp
lore: Tree-lace stretches across gaps like instrument strings; storms record themselves as grooves.

title: Vein Lantern
lore: Leaf veins glow when nearby organisms recall strong memories; used to time ceremonial retellings.

title: Lattice Wasp
lore: Spits cellulose threads that line safe corridors. Colonies migrate if human voices are too flat.

title: Murmur Cone
lore: Cones retain a whisper of the last sentence spoken nearby. Archivists crack them like safe locks.

title: Dew-Scribe Crab
lore: Writes in dew across white bark at dawn; text evaporates by noon leaving only reader’s recollection.

title: Thread Otter
lore: Wears a belt of knotted reeds; ferries news between downstream camps after monsoon breaks.

title: Pearl Barnacle
lore: Colonizes abandoned tools, layering them into ceremonial anchors to prevent drift in narratives.

title: Sighing Reed
lore: Exhales faint chords when pressed; notes vary with the handler’s remembered losses.

title: Trail Prism
lore: Tiny crystals that split canopy light into arrows; point to last known safe bivouac.

title: Hollow Choir
lore: Clustered trunks tuned to fourths and fifths; evening winds produce liturgical intervals.

title: Mendleaf
lore: Fuses torn foliage overnight; in people it works only if the story of the wound is told first.

title: Waystone Pulse
lore: Buried stones throb once per minute. Travelers count pulses to estimate distance in the fog.

title: Contested Copse (Alpha)
lore: Pearl etchings overlap gardener grafts; both patterns persist, forming ambiguous readouts.

title: Contested Copse (Beta)
lore: Gardener buds hijack pearl flows for a season, then yield; locals schedule disputes to the bloom.

title: Fog Needle
lore: Tensioned silk gathers fog into threads visible from far trails; points to water and bivouacs.
